script.line: What the-- Minty reversed the Spiky Plex! I didn't... I didn't even think that was a thing!
Bark bark!
Oh no! This is really bad news! Uh... uh...
Hey Prota! Hey Spiky Jon. I'm back from the shop. You takin' a stab at catchin' Minty?
Trying!
Cool! Well, I guess I'll head off.
But uh... if you don't mind me sayin', Jon, your form could use a little work.
My form?
Yeah. I ain't a nosey nellie or nothin', but...
...comin' back I noticed you weren't tuckin' your head in quite right.
You do that, you're more likely to get a sprain than catch a dog.
Huh. You know a lot about wrestling?
Eh, a bit. But I know a lot about sprains--After all, I'm a doctor.
Oh! Well, what if I bent just a little more?
Yeah, that'd help. You really wanna engage your shoulders, tuck the neck, and launch yourself.
Get your form right, you can't miss!
Bark bark!
Probably be even better if Prota helped you. I'd do it, but I got all these ingredients...
No! It's no problem! Let's do this, Jon!
Let's gooooo!
